DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational study is to describe the incidence of adverse events among patients treated with Refacto AF in usual health care settings in Germany and Austria.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Pharmacovigilance Of Refacto AF
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional study: subjects to be selected according to the usual clinical practice of their physician
DOC.criteria: Patients with hemophilia A of any severity already receiving or starting treatment with ReFacto AF. Patients with Hemophilia A treated with a product other than Refacto AF.
